verses.name: Luke 1:66
verses.text: And all they that heard them laid them up in their hearts, saying, What manner of child shall this be! And the hand of the Lord was with him.

verses.name: Luke 1:67
verses.text: And his father Zacharias was filled with the Holy Ghost, and prophesied, saying,

verses.name: Luke 1:68
verses.text: Blessed be the Lord God of Israel; for he hath visited and redeemed his people,

verses.name: Luke 1:69
verses.text: And hath raised up an horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David;

verses.name: Luke 1:70
verses.text: As he spake by the mouth of his holy prophets, which have been since the world began:
